name: Sylvie's Lunchbox Spinach Squares
description: These healthy, savoury squares make a great addition to any lunch.

ingredients.name: ricotta cheese or cottage cheese (about 1 cup)
Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Nacho Cheese Dip Mix

preparation: For base, mix oats with cheese and Fajita Seasoning. Scatter over bottom of an 8” baking pan. (Tip: line with parchment paper.)
For filling, beat eggs in a bowl. Mix in spinach, ricotta, 1⁄2 cup cheddar, Lemon Dilly Dip Mix, 3 Onion Dip Mix and Pepper.
Spoon egg and cheese mixture over base, and sprinkle with remaining cheddar. Bake for 35–40 minutes, until set. Let cool, then cut into squares.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix
summary: A delicious blend of bold chili with real Parmesan makes for a creamy nacho cheese dip or seasoning.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
